value:
I don't feel any different here than
back home, so what makes me a
Hero in this world?

Chrom once found me unconscious
and with no memory. He helped me,
and I joined the Shepherds.

I admire your diligence. The way
you're always running around
reminds me of myself.

I've got a plan, but I don't know how
it'll work in this world. We should
be sure to discuss it at length.

The library is fantastic! So many
wonderful books. Hmm. I probably
should get permission to go there.

Nice to meet you. I'm
Robin.$k$pI was asked to come say
hello by your good friend
$Nf.

Even I couldn't have seen this
coming!
This is all part of the plan.
Er, is that it?

I'm glad you see my strategic
value to the team.

My name is Robin, the tactician for
Chrom's Shepherds. I'm sure you'll
find me useful on the battlefield.

We've been through a lot together
on the battlefield, and I've watched
you every step of the way.$k$pNot to be presumptuous, but the
way you fight, your tactical skill, the
way you keep everyone safe...$k$pIt all reminds me of myself and how
I led my friends in battle back in my
own world.$k$pThat means I also know how much
you care about all of us and how
painful your position can be.$k$pIf that weight gets to be too much,
I want you to lean on me. After all,
I've been at this for a while...$k$pI might just come up with an
amazing plan that solves all your
problems, on or off the battlefield!
えい！
はあっ！
きゃっ！
Part of the plan...
Time to tip the scales!
Bet you didn't see that coming!
As I predicted!
Our bonds give me strength!
Oops.
Heehee
Oh, hey! I was just thinking I'd like to chat with you.
Let's work on a battle plan together.
I understand you're the tactician for this team.
I don't know why, but I feel a strange kinship with you.
My time before I arrived in Ylisse was a blank. No memories at all.
I wonder if Chrom is around here...
I look forward to working with you for a good, long time.
OK.
On it.
Right.
